ResourceEnum.Name: MstpReturnSatus
ResourceEnum.Resource: %% Error: System error
%% Error: Command is supported only in non-VCS mode
%% Error: minimum-links is supported only in non VCS mode
%% Error: Bridge is not configured as MSTP
%% Error: Bridge is not configured as PVST/RPVST
%% Error: The priority value must be in multiples of 4096
%% Error: Cannot set forward-delay,bridge_max_age <= 2*(bridge_forward_delay - 1)
%% Error: Cannot set max-age, 2*(bridge_forward_delay - 1)>=bridge_max_age>=2*(bridge_hello_time + 1)
%% Error: Cannot set hello-time, bridge_max_age >=2*(bridge_hello_time + 1)
%% Error: Configuration requires:2*(bridge_forward_delay - 1)>=bridge_max_age>=2*(bridge_hello_time + 1)
%% Error: One or more VLANs doesn't exist
%% Error: One or more VLANs overlap with another MSTP instance
%% Error: Instance doesn't exist
%% Error: Vlan should be between 1 - 4090
%% Error: Vlans more than 4096 are not allowed
syntax error: incomplete path
%% Error: Vlan doesn't exist
%% Error: Vlan should not map into any instance
%% Error: Maximum number of PVST instances exceeded
%% Error: MSTP Configuration not allowed as one/more vlan is secondary private vlan
%% Error: Configuration not allowed as vlan is secondary private vlan
%% Error: Spanning tree configurations not allowed as port is a private-vlan host port
%% Error: Spanning tree configuration not allowed for rspan-vlan
%% Error: Interface is not in L2 mode
%% Error: Priority is not a multiples of 16
%% Error: Port doesn't configure for the instance
%% Error: Port doesn't configure for the vlan
%% Error: Edge-loop-detection is enabled on this interface; cannot enable spanning tree.
%% Warning: Enabling bpdu-drop can cause bridging loops. Use with caution.
%% Error: This configuration is not allowed when spanning tree protocol is configred
%% Error: This configuration is not allowed when bpdu-drop is enabled on any interface
%% Error: This configuration is not allowed when tagged bpdu tunnelling is enabled on any interface
%% Error: MSTP configuration is not allowed when non dot1q vlan is configured with enabled spanning-tree
% Error: Value out of range
% Error: Spanning-tree is not configured
% Error: Bridge spanning-tree is shutdown
% Error: No information available for MST instance
% Error: Bridge not found
% Error: Bridge spanning-tree instance disabled due to max instance reached
Cannot set system id when spanning tree protocol is enabled. Disable the protocol and try again.
